call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - September 5th 2024

commitments.commitment: Alpha for Greek olive oil tokenization will come out in the next few weeks
commitments.quote: That's alpha that's actually going to come out in the next few weeks. We will let the community know when Greek olive oil is going to be available on the platform.

commitments.commitment: Return to Argentina in October to continue lithium tokenization business and visit mining provinces
commitments.quote: I'm going to be back in Argentina in October to continue the conversation to, well, not just the conversation, but to continue the business and also visit the mining provinces.

commitments.commitment: Charles will be in Japan next week and will come to Osaka and hopefully visit the Palmyra office
commitments.quote: And actually Charles is going to be in Japan next week. So I'm going to see him and we're going to spend some time together. He's going to come to Osaka as well. And hopefully we're going to host him at the Palmyra office.

commitments.commitment: Another DevNet will be released in one week, followed by a third one, then release candidates
commitments.quote: First DevNet is out like one week ago, right? And well, in one week there will be another DevNet. Then third one and yeah, after that we can do release candidates or to be close to mainnet release.

commitments.commitment: DevNet with peer-to-peer network based on sub-blocks for performance testing in a few weeks
commitments.quote: I think actually in a few weeks we can have some rough DevNet with peer-to-peer network based on sub-blocks for block transactions propagation.

commitments.commitment: Upgrade mainnet test server this weekend to test storage rent with volunteers
commitments.quote: We have plans this weekend to get some tea and do a Zoom call and upgrade the mainnet test server.

open_questions.question: Exact mechanics of lithium tokenization - whether it will be security token offering, commodity token, or both
open_questions.context: Working on tokenizing lithium production in Argentina

open_questions.question: Theme and details for potential Dubai Ergo meetup during Cardano Summit
open_questions.context: Planning bigger meetup than last year

open_questions.question: Status of Ledger integration audit
open_questions.context: There is a request for audit by a company friendly to Ledger

key_facts.fact: Lithium demand is 20 times more than incoming supply
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Sigma 6.0 first DevNet was released one week ago
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: About 28 gigahash from Sigmanauts mining DAO will be pointed to test storage rent, expected to generate 1-2 blocks per day
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: MewFinance opens on September 9th with P2P escrow trading
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Gluon SDK raffle is around 30% filled with 6 days left and over 5,000 ERGs needed
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sub-blocks will require only a velvet fork update - miners need to update but it's very soft
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Next spaces will be on September 12th about mnemonics
key_facts.speaker: qx()
